author: davidw
msg: * src/make.tcl: Created better dependency system for DocBook docs.
* doc/html/rivet.*.html: Added non-chunked versions of the docs.
* doc/rivet-nochunk.xsl: Change include of docbook.xsl to an import at
the top of the file.  Seems to make things work ok.

author: davidw
msg: * src/make.tcl: Don't delete rivet packages directory during install.
This used to happen in order to keep things clean, but people are
using this directory for local packages/modifications, so this is
not a good thing to have.

author: davidw
msg: * tests/headers.test: Include current version of http package in
result automatically, so as to avoid having to update it by hand.
function to fetch a conf file and all the files Included it from it.

author: davidw
msg: * doc/rivet.xml: Add section for session package.
